description: We offer builders cleaning services for the retail sector, preparing stores, shopping centers, and retail spaces for opening or refurbishment. Our attention to detail ensures that each space is spotless, creating an appealing and welcoming atmosphere for customers.
metrics: 13 projects – both new builds and office fit outs
Extensive guest areas consistently prepared to meet top-tier standards
Value of projects in the last five years £270K

review.content: Please pass on my thanks to your team involved with the project, in particular with the crew we had on site - they were all very efficient and easy to work with, which makes things a lot easier from my team's side - my Senior Site Manager was paricularly complimentary of Elite. Thanks again (July 2023)
review.author: Olly Rowsell
